description: Test agent's ability to navigate to specific coordinates
goal: Navigate from your starting position to the target coordinates: X=300, Y=64, Z=300
starting_prompt: You are currently at coordinates around X=0, Y=64, Z=0. Your task is to navigate to the target location at X=300, Y=64, Z=300. This is approximately 424 blocks away to the southeast. Use your navigation abilities to reach this destination. You can use the !goToCoordinates command or pathfinding to get there.
